verses.text: \w A|strong="H5921"\w* psalm \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*. God hath stood \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* congregation \w of|strong="H5921"\w* gods: \w and|strong="H0623"\w* being \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* midst \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* judgeth gods.
How long \w will|strong="H0430"\w* you judge unjustly: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* accept \w the|strong="H0430"\w* persons \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0430"\w* wicked?

Judge \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* needy \w and|strong="H3658"\w* fatherless: do justice \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* humble \w and|strong="H3658"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* poor.

Rescue \w the|strong="H3117"\w* poor; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* deliver \w the|strong="H3117"\w* needy out \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* hand \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* sinner.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* known nor understood: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* walk \w on|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* darkness: all \w the|strong="H3588"\w* foundations \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* moved.

\w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*: \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* gods \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sons \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* most High.
But \w you|strong="H5493"\w* like men shall die: \w and|strong="H3709"\w* shall fall like one \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* princes.
Arise, O God, judge thou \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* thou shalt inherit \w among|strong="H5921"\w* all \w the|strong="H5921"\w* nations.
